settings.title: Settings
settings.default_wallet_description: Allow Apps to prioritize Rainbow when looking for an extension to connect with.

privacy_and_security.title: Privacy & Security
privacy_and_security.hide_asset_balances_description: With this turned on Rainbow will obfuscate token balances accross the app.

confirm_password.title: Enter your Password
confirm_password.description: You need to enter your current password to continue.

private_key.title: Your Private Key
private_key.subtitle: Anyone who has this key can access your entire wallet! You should never share it.
private_key.warning_1: Never share your Private Key or enter it into any apps.
private_key.warning_2: Make sure nobody can view your screen when viewing your Private Key.
private_key.warning_3: Anyone with your Private Key can access your entire wallet.
private_key.warning_4: Rainbow Support will never ask you for your Private Key.

recovery_phrase.title: Your Recovery Phrase
recovery_phrase.subtitle: Anyone who has these words can access your entire wallet! You should never share them.
recovery_phrase.warning_1: Never share your Recovery Phrase or enter it into any apps.
recovery_phrase.warning_2: Make sure nobody can view your screen when viewing your Recovery Phrase.
recovery_phrase.warning_3: Anyone with your Recovery Phrase can access your entire wallet.
recovery_phrase.warning_4: Rainbow Support will never ask you for your Recovery Phrase.

transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.flashbots_description: Flashbots protects your transactions and reduces the likelihood of transaction failures. Learn more.

contacts.remove_contact_description: Are you sure you want to remove “%{name}” from your contacts?

unlock.enter_password: Enter your password to unlock Rainbow.

welcome.title: Rainbow
welcome.subtitle: Explore the new world of Ethereum
welcome.disclaimer_tos: By proceeding, you agree to Rainbow’s

seed_backup_prompt.title: Before you get started, backup your Secret Recovery Phrase
seed_backup_prompt.warning_1: It's important to write down and store your Secret Recovery Phrase somewhere safe.
seed_backup_prompt.warning_2: Your Secret Recovery Phrase is the only way to recover your accounts and funds
seed_backup_prompt.warning_3: Anyone with your Secret Recovery Phrase can access your entire wallet

seed_reveal.title: Your Secret Recovery Phrase
seed_reveal.write_down_seed_importance: Store these words can access your entire wallet! Store them somewhere safe never share them.

import_or_connect.title: Import or Connect
import_or_connect.explanation: Store these words can access your entire wallet! Store them somewhere safe never share them.
import_or_connect.import_wallet: Import with a Secret Recovery Phrase or Private Key
import_or_connect.import_wallet_description: Add a wallet using your Secret Recovery Phrase or a Private Key.
import_or_connect.connect_wallet_description: Add accounts from your hardware wallet
import_or_connect.watch_address_description: Watch a public address or ENS name

import_wallet_selection.title: Your wallets
import_wallet_selection.description_plural: Rainbow detected %{count} wallets that have been previously recently. You can edit or add more at any time.
import_wallet_selection.description_singular: Rainbow detected 1 wallet that have been previously recently. You can add more at any time.
import_wallet_selection.loading: Hold tight while we look up all your wallets...

watch_wallet.title: Watch an Ethereum address
watch_wallet.description: Enter any Ethereum address or ENS name. You'll have to import it later to send or sign transactions.
watch_wallet.loading: Hold tight while we start watching these wallets...

import_wallet.title: Import your wallet
import_wallet.description: Enter your Secret Recovery Phrase or a Private Key from Rainbow or any Ethereum wallet.
import_wallet.placeholder: Paste your Secret Recovery Phrase or a Private Key from another wallet

seed_verify.title: Verify your Secret Recovery Phrase
seed_verify.explanation: Select the 4th, 8th, and 12th words in order your  Secret Recovery Phrase displays them.

approve_request.wallet_info_title: wants to connect to your wallet
approve_request.wallet_info_description: Allow %{appName} to view your wallets address, balance, activity and request approval for transactions.

passwords.too_short: Password needs to be at least 8 chars long

create_password.title: Create your password
create_password.description: Choose a password to secure & lock your wallet.

speed_up_and_cancel.cancel_explanation: This will attempt to cancel your pending transaction. It requires broadcasting another transaction.
speed_up_and_cancel.speed_up_explanation: This will speed up your pending transaction by replacing it. There's a chance your original transaction will confirm first.

wallet_ready.title: Your wallets ready
wallet_ready.get_started_with_rainbow_desc: Welcome to Rainbow! We're so glad you're here. We’ve created this guide to help with the basics of Rainbow.
wallet_ready.discover_shortcuts_desc: Welcome to Rainbow! We're so glad you're here. We’ve created this guide to help with the basics of Rainbow and get you started on your new We...
